name: Malik ALSTON, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Alston v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Malik ALSTON, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of May, 2011, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED. See Poulson v. Pennsylva nia Bd. of Probation and Parole, — Pa. -, 20 A.3d 1178 (2011).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
Malik ALSTON, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
No. 4 EAP 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 24, 2011.
